scripts.dev_old with doc: parcel serve src/index.html docs/index.html src/about.html src/chart-chartistjs.html src/chart-chartsjs.html src/chart-d3js.html src/chart-highcharts.html src/map-google-api.html src/map-leaflet.html --dist-dir dist
scripts.parcel-build: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=1024 parcel build src/index.html src/about.html --no-cache --log-level verbose --no-source-maps --dist-dir dist --public-url ./ || echo 'Parcel failed'
scripts.copy-docs: cp -r docs dist/docs || echo 'Docs folder not found, skipping'
scripts.build: npm run docs && npm run parcel-build && npm run copy-docs
scripts.clean: rd /s /q dist && rd /s /q .parcel-cache && rd /s /q node_modules && npm cache clean --force
scripts.deploy: jsdoc src/ -r -d docs && npm run build && echo 'âœ… Deployment files are now ready in dist/'
scripts.docs:refresh: npm run docs:clean && jsdoc src/ -r -d docs && npm run docs && npm run docs:open
